question: Qutub Minar was constructed by Qutub-ud-din Aibak in the memory of which of the following famous Sufi saints?
explanation: Qutub-ud-din AibakÂ  started the construction of the Qutub Minar (only the first storey). It was constructed in the memory of the famous Sufi saint, Khwaja Qutbuddin Bakthiyar Kaki.
